thread.title: Amazing stay great hotel
thread.title_full: Amazing stay great hotel - Review of Novotel London Blackfriars, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: deanf812
title: Amazing stay great hotel
text:
From the first moment we went through the door to leaving the front desk staff could not do enough for you went for my wife's birthday weekend. Hotel room really big bed really comfy nice walk in shower and toilet. Great breakfast with lost of choice very friendly staff all way round the hotel great bar and service all round very good hotel on site pool and gym plus only a short walk to the Southbank and tube stations cant wait to go back in August
Room Tip: we stayed on top floor no noise at all good views See more room tips
